Multiple Card Slots: Add more card slots to accommodate various credit cards, loyalty cards, and other identification cards, making it more convenient for users to carry multiple cards in one place.
Built-in RFID Blocking: Incorporate an RFID-blocking material to prevent unauthorized access to the contents of the wallet through RFID scanners.
LED Display: Add a small LED display on the front of the wallet to show the balance of the cards, expiration dates, and other relevant information at a glance.
Expandable Capacity: Design the wallet with an expandable section to increase the storage capacity for cash, coins, and other items without the need for a new wallet.
Weather-Resistant Coating: Apply a weather-resistant coating to the wallet to protect the contents from water, snow, and other elements.
